intro: Goniogyna leiocarpa, commonly known as the smooth-seeded goniogyna, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers with four petals. Its fruits are capsule-like structures that release seeds when mature. Goniogyna leiocarpa is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and thickets.
